attributes.action: Give Mr Jamie Dixon an MBE for his services to roofing and roof safety
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For his services not only to the roofing industry but also for his devoted charity work, involving raising money for various charities, voluntary work in care homes, taking mentally disabled people for day trips and there general welfare. He has never allowed a member of staff fall from any working height, and his safety knowledge is second to none! We commend you Jamie Dixon

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
